item.title: Perfect jQuery UI rotating tabs
item.description: Tabs are nice. They create a very elegant interface, and jQuery UI does this marvelously, here we have a little preview of this: Figure 1: jQuery UI Tabs How to do that? Include the files With jQuery and jQuery UI it is dead simple. First, load the libraries, I recommend using the hosted files at Google for jQuery: <script src="http://jqueryjs.googlecode.com/files/jquery-x.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <script src="path/to/jquery UI" type="text/javascript"></script> Remember to include also the CSS files for the UI Theme!
